trends: There have been no other sightings in Kansas City MO
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsi had not given this sighting another thought until i learned a pilot flying into kci airport reported something he had seen. i drive into work early every morning between 4:50am-5:09am, which is the time i reach close to downtown kcmo. i will never forget what i saw. at first i thought i was just tired and imagined it. while driving on i-35 south (close to downtown kmco) was a disc like shaped object. it was kinda of blue\white and it was indeed some sort of craft. it was just sitting in the sky\hovering. it then moved a bit to the right\flying, and then stopped and suddenly went vertical. i have never seen an airplane or helicopter make a move like that. it seemed impossible. it disappeared into the sky after moving very fast vertically. very very scarey object-it was clearly not manmade that i could tell. what is going on.
